suncertify.ui
Class FileSelectionComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  suncertify.ui.FileSelectionComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FileSelectionComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Custom GUI component which consist of a text field and a button for browsing and selection for a file in file system.

FileSelectionComponent() instances will create a display an empty text field and browse button with default label DEFUALT_BROWSE_LABEL , and both are enabled.

When browse button is clicked, a JFileChooser will be shown to select a file. If a file is selected or the component was initially constructed with a default file selection, the text field will display its canonical path.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

DEFUALT_BROWSE_LABEL

public static final java.lang.String DEFUALT_BROWSE_LABEL
The default label to use for browse button.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

FileSelectionComponent

public FileSelectionComponent()
Constructs a file selection GUI component with no file initially selected.

FileSelectionComponent

public FileSelectionComponent(java.io.File selectedFile)
Constructs a file selection GUI component with initially file selected selectedFile.

The text field for this component will be set to passed selectedFile canonical path and its browse button label with default value. If passed file is null it will be set empty.

Parameters:
selectedFile - file to be set as currently selected file.

FileSelectionComponent

public FileSelectionComponent(java.lang.String browseButtonLabel)
Constructs a file selection GUI component with browse button label browseButtonLabel.

Parameters:
browseButtonLabel - the label to be used for browse button.

FileSelectionComponent

public FileSelectionComponent(java.lang.String browseButtonLabel,
                              java.io.File selectedFile)
Constructs a file selection GUI component with initially file selected selectedFile and browse button label browseButtonLabel.

The text field for this component will be set to passed selectedFile canonical path, if passed file is null it will be set empty.

Parameters:
browseButtonLabel - browse button label to be used.
selectedFile - initially selected file.

getSelectedFile

public java.io.File getSelectedFile()
Returns the current selected file or null if no file is selected.

It text field is Enabled and there was an entry in it, it would not be validated if it is a really path to a file, so the returned File instance can be a pointer for a file does not exist.

Returns:
returns the current selected file or null if no file is selected.

setSelectedFile

public void setSelectedFile(java.io.File selectedFile)
Sets the selected file and relatively display its Canonical path in this component text field.

An empty string will be displayed if passed selectedFile is null or getting file canonical path is failed.

Parameters:
selectedFile - current file selection.
